Lib

DHCP.c File Reference

#include "DHCP.h"

Functions

int16_t DHCP_ProcessDHCPPacket (void *IPHeaderInStart, void *DHCPHeaderInStart, void *DHCPHeaderOutStart)

Detailed Description

Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) packet handling routines. This protocol handles the automatic IP negotiation to the host, so that the host will use the provided IP address given to it by the device.

Function Documentation

int16_t DHCP_ProcessDHCPPacket ( void *  IPHeaderInStart,
void *  DHCPHeaderInStart,
void *  DHCPHeaderOutStart 
)

Processes a DHCP packet inside an Ethernet frame, and writes the appropriate response to the output Ethernet frame if the host is requesting or accepting an IP address.

Parameters:
[in] IPHeaderInStart Pointer to the start of the incoming packet's IP header
[in] DHCPHeaderInStart Pointer to the start of the incoming packet's DHCP header
[out] DHCPHeaderOutStart Pointer to the start of the outgoing packet's DHCP header
Returns:
The number of bytes written to the out Ethernet frame if any, NO_RESPONSE otherwise
